headline: JPMorgan (JPM): Revisiting Valuation After London HQ Expansion and $10 Billion Security Initiative Announcement
summary: JPMorgan Chase (JPM) has put two big markers down at once: a new three million square foot London tower and a $10 billion Security and Resilience Initiative, both aimed squarely at long term growth. See our latest analysis for JPMorgan Chase. Those moves come as JPMorgan’s share price sits around $312 and continues a strong multi year uptrend, with a roughly 31% one year total shareholder return highlighting sustained momentum. If this kind of large scale capital commitment has you thinking...
